hadiths.text: Ubaidullah bin Sa'eed said:"I heard Abu Usamah say: 'I never saw any man more assiduous in seeking knowledge than 'Abdullah bin Al-Mubarak, not in Ash-Sham, Egypt, Yemen or the Hijaz

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ الاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى إِبْرَاهِيمَ فِي النَّبِيذِ
chapter.eng-name: Different Reports From Ibrahim Concerning Nabidh
